content.webTitle: 67 arrested over murder of suspected sorcerer

fields.headline: 67 arrested over murder of suspected sorcerer
fields.bodyText: Police arrested 67 women in southern India on suspicion of murder after they allegedly killed a man whom they suspected of being a sorcerer. Parvathalu, a barber, was beaten and locked in his shop by a group of 150 women. They then set fire to the shop in the village of Muddireddypalli, said police. The villagers suspected Parvathalu of practising black magic and held him responsible for the large number of deaths in the village in the past year. The attack was prompted by the death of another woman this week, police said. They planned to arrest all the women involved.
